title: Shanghai to foster commercial space ecosystem
summary: A Shanghai government initiative aims to foster a space industry chain including a range of satellites, launch vehicles and related applications and infrastructure.

title: BREAKING! ESA Targets Summer 2024 For First Ariane 6 Launch
summary: ESA Director General Josef Aschbacher has announced a launch window for the inaugural Ariane 6 flight; targeting between June 15 and July 31, 2024.

title: NASA warns of “very problematic” space technology budget cuts
summary: The head of NASA’s space technology directorate warned an advisory group of a “significant impact” to some programs if the Senate version of an appropriations bill for 2024 becomes law.

title: ESA sets mid-2024 date for first Ariane 6 launch
summary: With the successful completion of a core stage hot-fire test, the European Space Agency says it now expects the first launch of the Ariane 6 to take place in the middle of 2024.

title: SpaceX acquires parachute supplier
summary: In a rare acquisition, SpaceX has purchased out of bankruptcy a company that provided components for Dragon spacecraft parachutes.
